body.p: Served as a captain of an independent company in the Grayson County Home Guard in 1863 and 1864. Ordered arrested in October 1864 by Governor Thomas E. Bramlette and General Stephen G. Burbridge for unlawful acts committed against loyal citizens in Grayson County.
